entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
